1: -module(homework6_SUITE).
    2: 
    3: -compile(export_all).
    4: 
    5: -include_lib("common_test/include/ct.hrl").
    6: 
    7: all() -> [
    8:     homework6_create_test, homework_insert_test,
    9:     homework_lookup_test
   10:     ].
   11: 
   12: init_per_suite(Config) ->
   13:     ok = application:start(homework6),
   14:     Config.
   15: 
   16: homework6_create_test(_Config) ->
   17:     {new, ok} = homework6:create(new),
   18:     already_exist = homework6:create(new).
   19: 
   20: homework_insert_test(_Config) ->
   21:     {insert, ok} = homework6:insert(new, key, val),
   22:     {insert, ok} = homework6:insert(new, key2, val2, 5).
   23: 
   24: homework_lookup_test(_Config) ->
   25:     val = homework6:lookup(new, key),
   26:     val2 = homework6:lookup(new, key2),
   27:     timer:sleep(5000),
   28:     undefined = homework6:lookup(new, key2).
   29: 
   30: end_per_suite(Config) ->
   31:     ok = application:stop(homework6),
   32:     Config.
